text: Istanbul Technical University is a public university in Istanbul, Turkey. Istanbul Technical University was started in 1773. According to Times Higher Education, ITU is ranked 108th in the world and 1st in Turkey in the technology and engineering. ITU's main campus is located on the Maslak. Istanbul's subway system has a stop at ITU's Maslak campus. ITU has 13 faculties and 6 institutes. == References == == Other websites == * Istanbul Technical University website, En * Istanbul Technical University website, Tr * ITU Mustafa Inan Library * ITU Ninova e-Learning Center * ARI Technopolis * National High Performance Computing Center , Turkish language * ITU EU Center * ITU Dual Degree Programs * ITU Science Center * ITU Radio , first university radio station in Turkey * ITU International Office * ITU Photo Gallery * Panoramic 360 ITU * Arıyorum Newspaper *arı24 Online News Service, operated by students * ITU Magazine * Arı Bulletin of ITU * A|Z ITU Journal, Architecture Magazine of the Technical University Category:Colleges and universities in Istanbul Category:1773 establishments Category:Establishments in Turkey Category:1770s establishments in Asia Category:1770s establishments in Europe
title: Istanbul Technical University
